Class InputStreamBodyWriter

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.http.server.netty.body.InputStreamBodyWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageBodyWriter<InputStream>, ResponseBodyWriter<InputStream>
@Internal @Singleton public final class InputStreamBodyWriter extends Object implements ResponseBodyWriter<InputStream>
Body writer for InputStreams.

4.0.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
